article_title: Ebola case raises questions about insurance coverage
article_text:
NBC News has promised to pay Ashoka Mukpo's medical bills.

The case of Ashoka Mukpo -- a freelance photojournalist who contracted Ebola will working for NBC News in Liberia -- has raised questions about how some types of health insurance policies will cover Ebola-related bills.

NBC News has promised to pay any Ebola-related bills not covered by the insurance.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: A freelance photojournalist's friends aren't sure his travel insurance will help pay his Ebola-care related medical bills.

article_summary:
The case of Ashoka Mukpo -- a freelance photojournalist who contracted Ebola will working for NBC News in Liberia -- has raised questions about how some types of health insurance policies will cover Ebola-related bills.
NBC News has promised to pay any Ebola-related bills not covered by the insurance.
NBC News has promised to pay Ashoka Mukpo's medical bills.
